system.description: When you fight in close combat, roll +Force.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You are outmatched and suffer the full brunt of your enemy's attack.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You inflict your damage, but choose one: you suffer their attack in return, you are disarmed or thrown back, or you open yourself up to danger.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You inflict your damage and avoid their attack. If you wish, you may also choose to inflict additional damage or gain some other advantage.
